title: Cannot log in
body:
The launcher opens fine. When i enter my login credentials, the regular popup appears saying "starting authentication process " and then "logging on..." as normal. Login screen disappears as normal, but client homescreen doesn't appear.

Running as administrator hasn't worked.

Please help!

replies.body:
Issue resolve. The client repair tool fixed it. :D
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Beat me to it! Haha! Glad to hear it works :)
